CARDS.title: Cafe Safar
CARDS.description: Cafe Safar is a comprehensive full stack application designed for order management at the restaurant 'Cafe-Safar'.It features distinct user and admin views. Users can place orders, review past orders and transactions, and manage their profiles. Admins have the ability to oversee orders, update the menu, monitor payments, and handle various administrative functions. The application is being built on the MERN stack and is currently a work in progress.

CARDS.title: Slack DM Sender
CARDS.description: A Slack bot that allows you to send direct messages to users in your workspace, appearing as if sent by you. Ideal for automated communication.

CARDS.title: Run AWS Locally (Docker-Localstack)
CARDS.description: Simplify your local development by emulating AWS cloud services using Localstack within Docker. This setup enables seamless testing and development of AWS-dependent applications locally, supporting S3 and SQS as of now, and ensuring faster feedback loops without incurring cloud costs.

CARDS.title: Gesture-Controlled Interactive Gaming
CARDS.description: An innovative computer vision project enabling hand gestures to control a game. Map gestures to W, A, S, D keys for a dynamic, hands-free gaming experience.
